name: h3
description: The 2025 Marucci Code Drop 8 USSSA Baseball Bat is engineered for performance, boasting a mid-loaded swing feel that enhances power. Its one-piece alloy construction, crafted from durable AZ75 Alloy, ensures all-season reliability. The innovative AV2 Knob incorporates a harmonic dampening system, providing players with a superior feel and reduced vibration. Featuring a 2 3/4 inch barrel diameter, the bat's ring-free barrel construction and multi-variable wall design create an expanded sweet spot, offering exceptional barrel flex and forgiving off-centered hits. With a striking black, lime, and white colorway, this bat is a game-changer for serious athletes. Warranty chevron-down chevron-down chevron-down Warranty A Full Manufacturer's Warranty of 365 Days is included. If a warranty issue arises, our Bat Experts are happy to assist you in reaching the manufacturer to get a fast replacement! Begin Your Claim Here: Start My Warranty Claim
features: Delivery: FAST & FREE Shipping on all orders
